TypeSignature.Value: public interface ISQLInput : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract ISQLInput implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type ISQLInput = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: An input stream that contains a stream of values representing an instance of an SQL structured type or an SQL distinct type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Sql.IArray ReadArray() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reads an SQL ARRAY value from the stream and returns it as an Array object in the Java programming language.
Docs.returns: an Array object representing data of the SQL ARRAY value at the head of the stream; null if the value read is SQL NULL

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if there is a database error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool WasNull() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves whether the last value read was SQL NULL.
Docs.returns: true if the most recently read SQL value was SQL NULL; false otherwise
